channel.title: Election Analytics: 2022 Congressional Midterm Elections
channel.description: Recent content on Election Analytics: 2022 Congressional Midterm Elections

item.title: 01-Introduction
item.description: MA, CA, etc: extremely blue vs Moderately red Does not necessarily translate to seat share Republican’s structural advantage (Bafumi et al, 2018)

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! My name is Kento Yamada, and I am a junior at Harvard College studying Government. I am writing this blog to predict the outcomes of the 2022 Congressional midterm elections as part “Government 1347: Election Analytics.”
